title: Kourtney Kardashian Claps Back at Troll Who Says Her Kids Ditched School to Go to Finland
text:
Photo credit: NBC - Getty Images More

From Harper's BAZAAR

Kourtney Kardashian clapped back at an Instagram troll who accused her kids of ditching school.

Kourtney and her family recently went on vacation to Finland and aired it on Keeping Up With the Kardashians.

Time and time again, Instagram and Twitter trolls try to come for Kourtney Kardashian, even though she’s never afraid to put them in their place when it’s warranted. This time, Kourtney clapped back at a troll who accused her kids of ditching school and implied that she doesn’t value education.

In the latest installment of Keeping Up With the Kardashians, Kourtney took viewers behind the scenes of her family’s recent vacation to Finland. She also shared her travel diary and more photos on her Poosh website, which she promoted on Instagram yesterday. She included some pics of her kids in her IG post, and they were incredibly adorable but they did open the door to some unfair criticism. Someone decided to comment, “Don’t your kids go to school 😫 their education is so important more than these trips.”

Quick note: Reality shows are filmed months in advance to give the show enough time to make it all make sense and look pretty, so this vacation had to have happened back in the spring. And that’s exactly what Kourt said when she responded to the troll, who probs just doesn’t know how filming works and might have forgotten that kids get breaks. (Ugh, can all of us Olds take a sec to shed a tear and pour one out for summer vacation?)

When one of Kourt’s followers defended her and said they went during spring break, Kourtney chimed in and schooled the troll on the school system and the benefits of traveling the world. A simple “Exactly, it was spring break, but traveling can be educational too,” ended the whole exchange.

So if you’re keeping score when it comes to Kourt clapping back at trolls, it’s like 781,236 to 0.
